text: Thammar Boyfriend is a 2016 Indian Bengali comedy film directed by Anindya Ghosh and stars Abir Chatterjee, Sabitri Chatterjee, and Arunima Ghosh. The film released theatrically on 18 November 2016. == Synopsis == Nandini is a wealthy and lonely woman who finds love in the much younger Partho, much to the chagrin of her adult son and daughter. == Cast == * Abir Chatterjee as Partho * Sabitri Chatterjee as Nandini * Arunima Ghosh == References == * Category:2016 films Category:2010s Bengali-language films Category:Indian films
title: Thammar Boyfriend
